alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 10:54PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ERIE... WYOMING...AND GENESEE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue through the midnight hour across southern and central Erie County from Angola to Hamburg and inland across the Buffalo Southtowns. Snowfall rates of around 2 inches per hour will continue in the most intense portion of the band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...The band of heavy lake effect snow will remain nearly stationary through midnight, with minor north south oscillations. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... South Buffalo, Cheektowaga, West Seneca, Lackawanna, Lancaster, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Elma, Eden, Marilla, Bennington, Orchard Park, Alden, Blasdell, Attica, and Angola. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 54 and 57A. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
